titleStmt.title: The Christmas ordinary a private show, wherein is expressed the jovial freedom of that festival : as it was acted at a gentleman's house among other revels / by W.R., Master of Arts.
titleStmt.author: W. R., Master of Arts.
W. R. (William Richards), 1643-1705.

notesStmt.note: Written by W.R., Master of Arts [i.e., W. Richards]. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
